abstract: From a street corner in Brooklyn to starting their own company, a group of day laborers seek a firmer financial foothold.
snippet: From a street corner in Brooklyn to starting their own company, a group of day laborers seek a firmer financial foothold.
lead_paragraph: After years of waiting on a Brooklyn street corner trying to land jobs cleaning houses, Teresa Bucio decided there had to be a better way to earn a living.

headline.main: From a Brooklyn Street Corner, a Women's Cleaning Cooperative Grows
